name: components-integrated
objective: Check all services and components are integrated
description: We want to make sure all services and components are integrated
pre_condition:
Board is flashed and booted
A terminal is opened

steps.expected: Config files, libraries, services and binaries are listed

author: sdx

name: service-launch
objective: Check all services and components can be launched
description: We want to make sure wa can launch components
pre_condition:
Board is flashed and booted
One terminal is opened

steps.description: Launch empathy from a command line with options version: e.g.: empathy -v
steps.expected: The version is the version expected

steps.description: Launch Gnome Online Accounts via a command line
Launch empathy from a command line

author: sdx

name: service-launch
objective: Check the communicating endpoints establish communication
description: We want to make sure connection and session can be established successfully
pre_condition:
Board is flashed and booted
One terminal is opened
Connected to network
Registered to an IM service
Account created

steps.expected: Communication is established and session is opened successfully

author: sdx
